txt.en: You just picked up a hobby! Just as you do with skills, the hobby has to be dragged onto your quickslot bar to make it accessible. Open your character journal, select the Hobby panel, and drag the hobby onto an available quickslot.

You just picked up a hobby! Just as you do with skills, the hobby has to be dragged onto your quickslot bar to make it accessible. Open your Hobby panel via the Start menu under 'Character', and drag the hobby onto an available quickslot.
